mapper.select: select r.R_REGI_NO as "no", r.U_STU_NO as "student.no", e.E_NO as "enroll.no", e.E_ENROLLTIME as "enroll.enrollTime", e.E_ENROLLDAY as "enroll.enrollDay", e.E_ENROLLNUM as "enroll.enrollNum", s.J_NO as "subject.no", s.J_T_CODE as "subject.siteCode.code", s.J_IS_PASSED as "subject.passed.passed", s.J_GRADE as "subject.grade", s.J_SUBJECT_NAME as "subject.subjectName", s.J_SCORE as "subject.score", s.J_SUB_PROF as "subject.professor.name", s.J_LIMIT_STU as "subject.limitStu", t.T_NO as "subject.siteCode.no", t.T_CODE as "subject.siteCode.code", t.T_NAME as "subject.siteCode.name" from E_ENROLLMENT e, J_SUBJECT s, T_SITEMAP t, R_REGISUBJECT r where e.E_J_SUBJECT_NO = s.J_NO and t.T_CODE = s.J_T_CODE and r.E_NO = e.E_NO

select r.R_REGI_NO as "no", r.U_STU_NO as "student.no", e.E_NO as "enroll.no", e.E_ENROLLTIME as "enroll.enrollTime", e.E_ENROLLDAY as "enroll.enrollDay", e.E_ENROLLNUM as "enroll.enrollNum", s.J_NO as "subject.no", s.J_T_CODE as "subject.siteCode.code", s.J_IS_PASSED as "subject.isPassed.isPassed", s.J_GRADE as "subject.grade", s.J_SUBJECT_NAME as "subject.subjectName", s.J_SCORE as "subject.score", s.J_SUB_PROF as "subject.professor.name", s.J_SUB_PROF as "subject.professor.name", s.J_LIMIT_STU as "subject.limitStu", t.T_NO as "subject.siteCode.no", t.T_CODE as "subject.siteCode.code", t.T_NAME as "subject.siteCode.name" from E_ENROLLMENT e, J_SUBJECT s, T_SITEMAP t, R_REGISUBJECT r where e.E_J_SUBJECT_NO = s.J_NO and t.T_CODE = s.J_T_CODE and r.E_NO = e.E_NO and r.U_STU_NO = #{no}
